definition: short name for Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1]
see 芙蓉[fu2 rong2], lotus/food that has been minced, shredded, or ground into a paste, suitable for stuffing or making a sauce
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
hibiscus/cotton rose (Hibiscus mutabilis)/lotus/foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan/Seremban, capital of Sembilan state 森美蘭|森美兰[Sen1 mei3 lan2], Malaysia
hibiscus/cotton rose (Hibiscus mutabilis)/lotus/foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan/Seremban, capital of Sembilan state 森美蘭|森美兰[Sen1 mei3 lan2], Malaysia
nickname for Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1]
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan
as a lotus flower breaking the surface (idiom); surpassingly beautiful (of young lady's face or old gentleman's calligraphy)
lit. lotus rises from the water (idiom); fig. to blossom (of poem or art)

sentences.english: Care of public property, canteens and so on must keep a record of all equipment register.
sentences.chinese: 爱护公物，食堂的一切设备等肚缶蓉须造册登记。

sentences.english: Chengdu city, Rong or Jingcheng for short.
sentences.chinese: 成都市，简称蓉或景程之。

sentences.english: Ming secretly come to rong was caught by Cheng Lin men, and for the clearance.
sentences.chinese: 明偷偷来找蓉被程林手下抓住，蓉替其解围。

sentences.english: Red Bean Paste is available from Japanese supermarkets or pastry supplies.
sentences.chinese: 心得红豆蓉于日式超级巿场或蛋糕材料专门店有售。

sentences.english: Hui is so lucky to have a nice wife Rong with a kind heart.
sentences.chinese: 辉很幸运，可以找到这么一个心地善良的好妻子蓉。

definition: used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
Tsushima Island, between Japan and South Korea
to store/to stand/space between the door and the entrance screen
(phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
